author: Special Correspondent
text: A team of officials on poll duty intercepted a vehicle at Pandiarajapuram near here, and a search revealed that there was 16 kilograms of silver items. When inquiries were conducted, the person could not produce any document to justify that it was being transported for a specific trade purpose in the city. The vehicle and the silverware reportedly brought from Salem, valued Rs 5.50 lakh, were seized. Further investigation was on.
title: 16 kg of silver seized
